I do not want to exclude a group of Ivorians because the crux of this crisis was the issue of exclusion. `` Now that I have succeeded through democratic elections to be elected as president, my first priority is to ban exclusions and also to protect minorities,'' he said. Addressing heads of state on Jan. 30, the outgoing AU chair, Malawi President Bingu wa Mutharika , called on Gbagbo to respect the will of Ivorians and hand over power to Alassane Ouattara . The refusal by Mr. Gbagbo to respect the result in November 2010 elections in Cote d'Ivoire poses a serious threat to democracy in Africa, he said, adding that he wanted the African Union to maintain its suspension of C?te d'Ivoire's membership of the AU until Alassane Ouattara assumed power. David Cameron said he was`` very sorry'' Andy Coulson felt`` compelled'' to go after months of pressure, insisting he was being punished for the same offence twice . However, Labour frontbencher Chris Bryant said he hoped the Metropolitan Police would now conduct a thorough investigation into the phone hacking. He said:`` I hope now that the murky truth will come to light.''
